question: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
true_answer: Because it has a very high rainfall.
asked_question_translated: ¿Por qué Kota Bogor (Indonesia) es conocida como la "Ciudad de la Lluvia"?
answer: Kota Bogor es conocida como la "Ciudad de la Lluvia" debido a su alta frecuencia de precipitaciones, ya que recibe lluvia casi a diario a lo largo del año.
answer_translated_eng: Kota Bogor is known as the "Rain City" due to its high frequency of rainfall, receiving rain almost daily throughout the year.
